task.title: Removing hub covers
task.shortdesc: You need to remove the hub cover when you want to undo the wheel nuts to change a wheel. Use the wheelbrace tool and a special technique to remove the wheel hub cover.

step.cmd: Insert the flattened end of the wheelbrace into one of the recesses between the edge of the cover and the road wheel.
Use a sideways motion with the wheelbrace to prise off the cover.

stepresult.note: Do not use an upward levering motion.

step.cmd: Insert the flattened end of the wheelbrace between the lip of the cover and wheel rim.
Using the tyre as a fulcrum at a point diametrically opposite the tyre valve, ever the cover away from the wheel.
